title: Manual Therapy
shortDesc: Hands-on techniques to mobilize joints and soft tissues.
fullDesc: Manual therapy involves specialized hands-on techniques to diagnose and treat soft tissues and joint structures. It helps in reducing pain, increasing range of motion, and reducing inflammation.

title: Sports Rehabilitation
shortDesc: Specialized care for sports-related injuries and performance.
fullDesc: Our sports rehabilitation program is designed to help athletes recover from injuries and return to their sport stronger. We focus on injury prevention, pain management, and functional training.

title: Cryotherapy
shortDesc: Cold therapy to reduce inflammation and pain.
fullDesc: Cryotherapy uses extreme cold to freeze and destroy abnormal tissue. It is used to treat skin conditions, tumors, and muscle damage.

title: Neuro Rehabilitation
shortDesc: Rehabilitation for stroke, Parkinson's, and other conditions.
fullDesc: Neurological rehabilitation involves a doctor-supervised program for people with diseases, injury, or disorders of the nervous system. It can often improve functionality, reduce symptoms, and improve the well-being of the patient.

title: Orthopedic Physiotherapy
shortDesc: Recovery from fractures, surgeries, and skeletal issues.
fullDesc: Orthopedic physiotherapy focuses on the treatment of the musculoskeletal system, including joints, muscles, tendons, ligaments, and bones.

title: Pediatric Physiotherapy
shortDesc: Developmental support for children and infants.
fullDesc: Pediatric physiotherapy assists in the early detection of health problems and uses a wide variety of modalities to treat disorders in the pediatric population.
